derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from bob(with reference to its short tail) + cat

entry.tran: 短尾猫，红猫，山猫（一种北美野猫）
entry.def: A bobcat is an animal in the cat family which has reddish-brown fur with dark spots or stripes and a short tail. Bobcats live in North America.

example.ex: Bobcats roam wild in the mountains.

auth_sentence.content: When I tell other hunters I saw a bobcat, coyote, etc., they always ask my why I didn't shoot it. Professional courtesy I guess.
